DOC.brief_summary: To provide access of the Becker Expander/Breast implant to women who do not meet inclusion/exclusion criteria of the Becker Continued Access Study Patients' physician will contact Mentor to request use of the device and each request will be reviewed by Mentor, an IRB, and the FDA on a case-by-case basis
DOC.brief_title: Compassionate Use of the Becker Expander/Breast Implant
DOC.criteria: Women who require a Becker Expander/Breast implant who do not meet inclusion/exclusion criteria of the Becker Continued Access Study
